title: Darkness Falls
description: No longer available.Where will you be when the lights go out?Darkness Falls is a frame novel, a story within a story. Primarily, it tells the story of one man, Robert Hendricks. We first meet him in 2179 onboard an alien starship approaching Earth. It will be the first time he returns in over 150 years.Through his recollections, we return to 2026 where we learn about the cataclysmic circumstances surrounding his departure. The end begins with a total blackout of North America. It doesn't take long for him to learn that the line between order and chaos is as thin as a stream of electrons flowing down a copper wire
author: Mathieu Gallant
